title: Refer Your Friends
content: Refer your friend to BoardX. If they sign up, you and your friend will get 10K BoardX Credits for AI features
stepcontent1: Send your referral link to your friends
stepcontent2: Let them register and create their own team
stepcontent3: You both will get 10K credits for AI features
note1: Note: If your want to invite your teammates to
shareLinkNote: Copy and send it or share it on your social media
